stories.definitionOfDone:
• System Integration: The system is successfully integrated with other systems, and all APIs are functioning as expected. The integration is tested with a minimum of 90% success rate.
• Data Processing: The data processing component is able to process weather data from all stations within the specified time frame (less than 30 minutes). The processed data is accurate and complete, with no errors or inconsistencies detected during testing.
stories.description: The system must collect weather data from all stations, process it, and transmit it to the Data Management and Archiving System for storage and retrieval so that accurate weather forecasts can be generated.
stories.testCases:
Test: Verify that the system must collect weather data from all stations, process it, and transmit it to the data management and archiving system for storage and retrieval
Expected: Functionality works as specified in the user story
stories.title: Collect Weather Data All Stations

stories.definitionOfDone: • Power Management: The system successfully manages power by automatically charging batteries when possible and shutting down generators in damaging weather conditions, ensuring minimal downtime and data loss.
stories.description: The system must manage system power: Ensures batteries are charged when possible, but shuts down generators in damaging weather conditions to prevent damage or loss of data so that the system remains operational.
stories.testCases:
Test: Verify that the system must manage system power: ensures batteries are charged when possible, but shuts down generators in damaging weather conditions to prevent damage or loss of data
Expected: Functionality works as specified in the user story
stories.title: Manage System Power: Ensures Batteries

stories.definitionOfDone: • System Reconfiguration: The system reconfiguration process is automated, and all necessary steps are completed within 30 minutes. The system's functionality remains unchanged after a reconfiguration. All backup instruments are successfully integrated into the system.
stories.description: The system must allow for dynamic reconfiguration: Replaces software parts with new versions and switches backup instruments into the system upon failure to ensure continuous operation so that the system remains operational.
stories.testCases:
Test: Verify that the system must allow for dynamic reconfiguration: replaces software parts with new versions and switches backup instruments into the system upon failure to ensure continuous operation
Expected: Functionality works as specified in the user story
stories.title: Allow Dynamic Reconfiguration: Replaces Software
